definition: Salween river, flowing from Tibet into Myanmar
warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]

sentences.english: Similar sediment pollution scenarios are occurring in the headwaters of the Salween and Yangtze Rivers.
sentences.chinese: 在萨尔温江和长江上游也存在类似的泥沙污染状况。

definition: Irrawaddy or Ayeyarwaddy River, the main river of Myanmar (Burma)
